Package io.permazen

Class PermazenCollectionField

java.lang.Object
io.permazen.PermazenSchemaItem
io.permazen.PermazenField
io.permazen.PermazenComplexField
io.permazen.PermazenCollectionField
Direct Known Subclasses:
PermazenListField, PermazenSetField
public abstract class PermazenCollectionField extends PermazenComplexField
Represents a collection field in a PermazenClass.
